trans-unit.source: Enumerates values for the <see langword="Volume" /> property of a <see langword="Prosody" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Enumera i valori per la proprietà <see langword="Volume" /> di un oggetto <see langword="Prosody" />.

trans-unit.source: Typically synthetic speech engine output volume as defined by the members of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ProsodyVolume> correspond to a percent of the maximum possible output loudness.
trans-unit.target: In genere sintetica vocale il volume di output come definito dai membri di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ProsodyVolume> corrisponde a una percentuale di sonorità il massimo possibile di output.

trans-unit.source: For instance Loud corresponds to approximately 80% of the maximum volume.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio alta corrisponde a circa l'80% del volume massimo.

trans-unit.source: However, any specific synthetic speech engine implementations may choose how to render audio output for a given value of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ProsodyVolume.Loud>.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, le implementazioni di motore vocale sintetica specifico possono scegliere come eseguire il rendering di output audio per un determinato valore di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ProsodyVolume.Loud>.

trans-unit.source: The current base volume setting for a custom synthetic speech engine is obtained as a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ProsodyVolume> value through the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.Volume%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.Volume%2A> site supplied to that engine.
trans-unit.target: Il volume di base impostazione corrente per un modulo personalizzato vocale sintetica si ottiene come un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ProsodyVolume> valore tramite il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.Volume%2A> proprietà il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.Volume%2A> fornito al motore di tale sito.

trans-unit.source: Fine tuning and modulation of output volume is managed on the basis of particular <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> objects, using members of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ProsodyVolume> to set the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody.Volume%2A> property on instances of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody.Volume%2A> used in creating or modifying the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> object for the instance of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.
trans-unit.target: Costituisce l'ottimizzazione e modulazione del volume di output viene gestito in base al particolare <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> oggetti, tramite i membri di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ProsodyVolume> per impostare il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody.Volume%2A> proprietà nelle istanze di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody.Volume%2A> utilizzato nella creazione o modifica di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> oggetto per l'istanza di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.

trans-unit.source: Current default volume value, same as the value returned by the <see cref="P:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.Volume" /> property on the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite" /> site supplied to that engine.
trans-unit.target: Valore predefinito del volume corrente, uguale al valore restituito dalla proprietà <see cref="P:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.Volume" /> nel sito <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite" /> fornito a tale motore.
